backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining lease listings, requests, user profiles, and access-controlled CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a UI change to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router and layout configuration with theme provider and modal wiring.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Badge showing the logged‑in user's name using Internet Identity and profile data.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Auth gate that blocks access and displays a login prompt for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Incomi: Dashboard panel showing incoming lease requests with status update actions.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/LeaseO: Dialog component for creating or editing lease listings with form handling and mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/OwnerO: Displays owner's lease listings with options to create, edit, or archive entries using dialogs and tables.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout wrapper that renders top navigation, main content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with links, social icons, and attribution, dynamically showing the current year.
frontend/src/components/leases/EmptyStat: Simple card component that shows a placeholder message when no data is available.
frontend/src/components/leases/LeaseList: Card displaying lease listing details with status, metrics, and a link to the listing page.
frontend/src/components/marketing/GetUni: Marketing section promoting the Unity Network mobile app with store badges and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/media/YouTubeSho: Section embedding a set of YouTube Shorts with titles and descriptions for instructional content.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TopNa: Responsive top navigation bar with links, authentication UI, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/requests/SubmitL: Form component allowing authenticated users to submit lease requests with a message for a listing.
frontend/src/components/requests/TenantR: Displays the current user's submitted lease requests with status, dates, and messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides authentication helpers exposing identity, login, logout, and principal formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaseListings.ts: Hooks for fetching active and owner lease listings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaseRequests.ts: Hooks for submitting lease requests and fetching/updating tenant or owner request lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useOwnerDashboard.ts: Mutation hooks for creating, updating, and archiving lease listings with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for retrieving and saving the current user's profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining theme variables, dark mode settings, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page combining offers, incoming requests, and tenant requests panels within a tab UI.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Displays a walkthrough of how the ULO leasing process works, including steps and an explanation of lease codes.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Provides the main marketing landing page with a hero section and feature highlights for the ULO lease hub.
frontend/src/pages/LeaseDetailsPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a specific lease listing and includes a form to submit lease requests.
frontend/src/pages/LeaseListingsPage.tsx: Lists active lease listings with sorting options and loading or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Renders a simple 404 page with a link back to the home page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, requirements, constraints, and existing features for building a mobile‑friendly ICP‑hosted lease‑listing site with a single admin and limited ULO user functionality. Includes architectural notes, known issues, and feature metadata.
